altername_name: I want to save the world BATTLE TOURNAMENT
name: Bokumo Sekai wo Sukuitai: Battle Tournament
overview: (Google translated from the Japanese WiiWare page) This game is a hero training adventure game which raises the hero before becoming a brave to a hero through levelup and various events. In addition, we also have a mode to participate in the martial arts competition with the brave person who developed it. "Scenario mode" covers elements of various RPGs while moving and moving fighting against foe enemies progresses in a simplified adventure format. In "Martial Arts Tournament Mode", you can compete in the martial arts competition with the nurtured brave. It is also possible to participate in various pre-prepared tournaments, organize a tournament by deciding rules themselves, and participate in the tournament with a hero who has trained himself. Even the hero who trained in the previous work "I want to save the world" can participate in the martial arts competition and if there is save data of the previous work, you can register the brave of the previous work without entering the password. While enjoying the process of making your favorite brave, please enjoy how much hero is a brave man and skill test at martial arts competition.
